short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search Youtube from right click menu.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Light weight extension to add "Search by Youtube" option in your browser's right click menu. 

+Clicking extension icon opens up youtube.com so you don't have to type address. 

Update: 0.0.0.2
Removed tab change for good.
